data:
## function_createTree
> **createTree**(`props`?): [`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)

Create a Tree with given config props

### Parameters

• **props?**: [`PropsConfig`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#propsconfig)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)\>

### Returns

[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)

a TreeWidget

## function_getTreeDefaultConfig
> **getTreeDefaultConfig**(): [`TreeProps`](#treeprops)

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default Tree config

### Returns

[`TreeProps`](#treeprops)

the default Tree config

## interface_NormalizedTreeItem
Normalized TreeItem object

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `string`

Accessibility label for the node

***

#### children

> **children**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)[]

An array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`

If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`

String title of the node

***

#### level

> **level**: `number`

Level in the hierarchy, starts with 0 for a root node

## interface_TreeApi
Interface representing the API for a Tree component.

## class_TreeComponent
TreeComponent is an Angular component that extends the BaseWidgetDirective
to provide a customizable tree widget. This component allows for various
configurations and customizations through its inputs and outputs.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel

> **ariaLabel**: `undefined` \| `string`

Optional accessibility label for the tree if there is no explicit label

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaLabelToggleFn

> **ariaLabelToggleFn**: `undefined` \| (`label`) => `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute of the toggle

##### Param

tree item label

##### Default Value

```ts
(label: string) => `Toggle ${label}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `undefined` \| `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### expandToggle

> **expandToggle**: `EventEmitter`\<[`TreeItem`](#treeitem)\>

An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### navSelector

> **navSelector**: `undefined` \| (`node`) => `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLButtonElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLButtonElement)\>

Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Param

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```

***

#### nodes

> **nodes**: `undefined` \| [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Array of the tree nodes to display

##### Default Value

`[]`

***

#### root

> **root**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the tree

***

#### toggle

> **toggle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item toggle

### Accessors

#### api

##### Get Signature

> **get** **api**(): `W`\[`"api"`\]

Retrieves the widget api

###### Returns

`W`\[`"api"`\]

the widget api

***

#### directives

##### Get Signature

> **get** **directives**(): `W`\[`"directives"`\]

Retrieves the widget directives

###### Returns

`W`\[`"directives"`\]

the widget directives

***

#### state

##### Get Signature

> **get** **state**(): [`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

Retrieves the widget state. Each property of the state is exposed through an Angular [Signal](https://angular.dev/api/core/Signal)

###### Returns

[`AngularState`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#angularstate)\<`W`\>

the widget state

## type alias_TreeContext
> **TreeContext**: [`WidgetSlotContext`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#widgetslotcontext)\<[`TreeWidget`](#treewidget)\>

Represents the context for a Tree widget.
This interface is an alias for `WidgetSlotContext<TreeWidget>`.

## constant_treeDefaultItemToggle
> `const` **treeDefaultItemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

A constant representing the default slot for tree item toggle.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotItem
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotItem**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

A constant representing the default slot for tree item.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotItemContent
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotItemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

A constant representing the default slot for tree item.

## constant_treeDefaultSlotStructure
> `const` **treeDefaultSlotStructure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

A constant representing the default slot for tree structure.

## interface_TreeDirectives
Interface representing various directives used in the Tree component.

### Properties

#### itemAttributesDirective

> **itemAttributesDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive to handle attributes for the tree item

##### Type declaration

###### item

> **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

***

#### itemToggleDirective

> **itemToggleDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#directive)\<`object`\>

Directive to handle toggle for the tree item

##### Type declaration

###### item

> **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

***

#### navigationDirective

> **navigationDirective**: [`Directive`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#directive)

Directive to attach navManager for the tree

## interface_TreeItem
Represents a tree item component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the node

***

#### children?

> `optional` **children**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Optional array of children nodes

***

#### isExpanded?

> `optional` **isExpanded**: `boolean`

If `true` the node is expanded

***

#### label

> **label**: `string`

String title of the node

## class_TreeItemContentDirective
Directive to provide a template reference for tree item content.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## class_TreeItemDirective
Directive to provide a template reference for tree item.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## class_TreeItemToggleDirective
Directive to provide a template reference for tree item toggle.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeSlotItemContext](#treeslotitemcontext).

## interface_TreeProps
Represents the properties for the Tree component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the tree if there is no explicit label

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### ariaLabelToggleFn

> **ariaLabelToggleFn**: (`label`) => `string`

Return the value for the 'aria-label' attribute of the toggle

##### Parameters

• **label**: `string`

tree item label

##### Returns

`string`

##### Default Value

```ts
(label: string) => `Toggle ${label}`
```

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### nodes

> **nodes**: [`TreeItem`](#treeitem)[]

Array of the tree nodes to display

##### Default Value

`[]`

***

#### onExpandToggle

> **onExpandToggle**: (`node`) => `void`

An event emitted when the user toggles the expand of the TreeItem.

Event payload is equal to the TreeItem clicked.

##### Parameters

• **node**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the tree

### Methods

#### navSelector

> **navSelector**(`node`): `NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLButtonElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLButtonElement)\>

Retrieves expand items of the TreeItem

##### Parameters

• **node**: [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

HTML element that is representing the expand item

##### Returns

`NodeListOf`\<[`HTMLButtonElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLButtonElement)\>

##### Default Value

```ts
(node: HTMLElement) => node.querySelectorAll('button')
```

## type alias_TreeSlotItemContext
> **TreeSlotItemContext**: [`TreeContext`](#treecontext) & `object`

Represents the context for a tree item, extending the base `TreeContext`
with an additional `item` property.

### Type declaration

#### item

> **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

## interface_TreeState
Represents the state of a Tree component.

### Properties

#### ariaLabel?

> `optional` **ariaLabel**: `string`

Optional accessibility label for the tree if there is no explicit label

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### expandedMap

> **expandedMap**: `object`

Getter of expanded state for each tree node

##### get

###### Parameters

• **item**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)

###### Returns

`undefined` \| `boolean`

***

#### item

> **item**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item

***

#### itemContent

> **itemContent**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item content

***

#### itemToggle

> **itemToggle**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeSlotItemContext`](#treeslotitemcontext)\>

Slot to change the default tree item toggle

***

#### normalizedNodes

> **normalizedNodes**: [`NormalizedTreeItem`](#normalizedtreeitem)[]

Array of normalized tree nodes

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#slotcontent)\<[`TreeContext`](#treecontext)\>

Slot to change the default display of the tree

## class_TreeStructureDirective
Directive to provide a template reference for tree structure.

This directive uses a template reference to render the [TreeContext](#treecontext).

## type alias_TreeWidget
> **TreeWidget**: [`Widget`](../../../../api/angular/bootstrap/components/tree/../../types#widget)\<[`TreeProps`](#treeprops), [`TreeState`](#treestate), [`TreeApi`](#treeapi), [`TreeDirectives`](#treedirectives)\>

Represents a Tree widget component.
